description:
Luffy and his crew search for a way out of Ape`s Concert, but the Rainbow Mist is an inescapable maze of madness. Back on shore, Nami, Chopper, and Sanji face a lifetime of hard labor for failing to pay their taxes!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Furusato e no Omoi! Dasshutsu Funou no Kaizoku Hakaba!
Il cimitero dei pirati, un luogo senza ritorno
Le mal du pays ! Un cimetière de pirates dont nul ne revient !
Thoughts of Home! The Pirate Graveyard of No Escape!
Скучая по дому! Несбегательное пиратское кладбище!
مشاعر الحنين! مقبرة القراصنة الّتي لا خروج منها!
ค้นหาทางกลับบ้านเกิด หนีออกจากสุสานเรือซึ่งไร้กาลเวลา
故郷への想い! 脱出不能の海賊墓場!
